word_mean: 原生质，原浆：为粘稠、半透明的多相胶体，以水为其连续相，是构成所有动植物细胞的基本物质。主要由核酸、蛋白质、脂类、糖类和无机盐构成。核周围的原生质称为细胞质，而构成细胞核的原生质称为核质

sentence.Network_en: Others are associated with the protoplasm of the cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 其它一些与细胞的细胞质有关.

sentence.Network_en: Each cell possesses a nucleus imbedded in protoplasm.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个细胞都具有核,细胞核位于原生质中.

sentence.Network_en: This release of the products of cellular protoplasm to the extracellular fluid accounts for several events.
sentence.Network_cn: 细胞浆产物进入细胞外液后被排出,即可导致以下各现象.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学专业英语_百度文库 ... 细胞学 cytology; 原生质 protoplasm; 细胞膜 cell membrane.
阿米巴一生游泳过活,正像一滴白色冻子般的原形质(Protoplasm)。其动作奇妙,如躲避强光与有害的化学品、追寻食物等。它找到一点食物就包围它,为每「一口」食物就.
1. 原生质分离protoplasm 原浆; 原生质protoplasm face 胞质半单位膜面

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek prōtoplasma (see proto-, plasma)

means.word_mean: 1. the living substance of a cell (including cytoplasm and nucleus)

auth_sentence.content: Considering the exposures you list, you probably are blessed with excellent protoplasm.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Considering the exposures you list, you probably are blessed with excellent protoplasm.
